thread.title: Sylvia Rutishauser-James

author: Sylvia Rutishauser-James
title: Sylvia Rutishauser-James
text: I liked your website. I like the things I ordered. My only disappointment was that having had the email about a Â£3 discount I was not able to find the code for it - so I 'phoned and was told it would be "applied automatically at the end". That didn't happen. I was planning to order at full price, so in a sense it doesn't matter. But it does matter for your customer relations profile - which is why I'm letting you know.
